ygData.subject: Re: Newbie needs some help
ygData.msgSnippet: Most of what Kei said is correct. Two corrections/adds though. 1) Start losing Exp at level 5. I don t believe you can lose the level 5 level though.
ygData.messageBody:
Most of what Kei said is correct. Two
corrections/adds though.<br><br>1) Start losing Exp at level 5. I
don't believe you can lose the level 5 level though.
But you can lose exp at that level. So that's when
you want to stop dying. Grin.<br><br>2) You can lose
skill points IF you lose more than 2 levels. For
example, if you had a very bad luck streak-- went from
just inside 25 all the way to just under 23 (which
would really STINK btw)-- you would also go down to max
skill points you could have at level 24. (I believe. I
know you lose skill points though).<br><br>Hope that
clarifies. Again -- to reiterate...<br><br>1) Don't want to
die after level 5 b/c of exp loss.<br><br>2) Don't
want to lose two levels to dying.<br><br>shooman
out<br>Fatedhue Prismatic-- just hit 31 again! LOL.<br>Hopefully
I can keep it this time.
